q: Ronald Herring , who has written editorials opposing the war in Afghanistan, said that he was a`` pariah on campus'' because the op-eds were`` universally condemned.'' Despite the criticism, Ronald Herring maintained that it was a little crazy to put soldiers[ in Afghanistan] in the first place. He reiterated former Secretary of Defense Donald Rumsfeld 's question,'`` Are we creating more terrorists than we're killing?'''
